reviews.name: Repel 100 Percent Deet Pump, 4 oz
reviews.reviewText: Our property is infested with mosquitoes. Recently, the mosquitoes in our yard tested positive for West Nile Virus. Repel 100 is the only product that keeps the mosquitoes from biting.
reviews.title: This product works!

reviews.name: Repel 100 Percent Deet Pump, 4 oz
reviews.reviewText:
I've never really ever needed bug spray before. However, when I go to North Carolina to visit my grandparents, we go shooting on a farm in the woods - and boy are there bugs! You can easily see the entire swarm of mosquitos and see the ticks everywhere.

However, spraying a paper towel with this stuff and rubbing it on exposed skin then spraying it on pant legs completely eliminates problems from both!

Even more so: I'm the kind of person who doesn't even like bugs flying around me - and they don't. I can sit there for five minutes really still lining up my shot and not a single bug enters my field of view.

This stuff is fantastic.
reviews.title: Not a bug spray guy

reviews.name: Repel 100 Percent Deet Pump, 4 oz
reviews.reviewText: This is a great repellent. It is however greasier than most other repellents.
reviews.title: Great!
